p: On the 7 th day, the rats were euthanized 3 hours after the induction of gastric ulcer under an overdose of ether and the stomachs were immediately excised. The stomachs were gently rinsed with normal saline to remove the gastric contents and blood clots. Then, the stomachs were dissected to examine macroscopically for haemorrhagic lesions. The number and severity of the ulcers were observed microscopically. Scoring system reported in Mi√±ano et al. [ 23] was used to quantitate the ulcer index.
